user_query: I'm a nutritionist and I need a comprehensive API for analyzing the nutritional value of different food items. Can you recommend an API that provides accurate and detailed nutrition analysis? Additionally, I would like to access guidelines on nutrition and dietary recommendations.

TaskList.description: Research available APIs that provide nutritional analysis of food items, ensuring they include accurate and detailed nutritional values.
Evaluate the researched APIs based on their accuracy, comprehensiveness, and user reviews.
Select the most suitable API for nutritional analysis based on the evaluation results.
Find relevant guidelines on nutrition and dietary recommendations, including government and health organization resources.
